titles.title: Native ELDER Act
Enhancing Native Elders' Longevity, Dignity, Empowerment, and Respect Act
Native ELDER Act
A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to enhance the longevity, dignity, empowerment, and respect of older individuals who are Native Americans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
